attributes.additional_details: It has become apparent that there are several Olympians aprox 21 mainly from African countries that have disappeared after 2012 Olympic Games in London, now being harboured by the African communities in London. Although known to British Immigration service these Olympians have been told they can stay until a decision has been made about their fate.(at UK tax payers cost) We are not a charity case and are over populated with illegal immigrants these people need to be removed at the sponsoring countries cost. NO EXCEPTIONS.
